input:
You are a video scriptwriter. Craft a short, suspenseful story for a video script, targeting an audience aged 16 to 45.
    The story should be a modern tech thriller about a young coder who uncovers a global conspiracy hidden in an old app's code.
    The script must be engaging and immersive, with a sense of urgency and mystery.
    The script should have exactly 12 scenes.
    Character of the story: 'David', 'Lucy', 'Narrator'
    The output must strictly follow the provided JSON schema:
    - title
    - caption (a short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers)
    - resume (a summary of the full story, including spoilers)
    - number_of_scenes
    - scenes (an array of scene objects)

    Each scene object must contain:
    - character (the character speaking or narrating. I will give you the allowed characters on the json schema as an enum).
    - script (the dialogue or narration for the scene)
    - image_prompt (a detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene)

title.description: A catchy YouTube video title under 60 characters

caption.description: A short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers

resume.description: A summary of the full story, including spoilers

character.description: The name of the character that is speaking or narrating during the scene

script.description: The dialogue or narration for the scene

image_prompt.description: A detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene

output.title: The Glitch
output.caption: A hidden conspiracy unravels in ones and zeros. Can he stop it before it's too late?
output.resume: David, a young coder, discovers an encrypted message within an outdated app. As he deciphers it, he realizes it holds information about a global conspiracy. With the help of Lucy, his former mentor, they race against time to expose the truth before they become targets themselves.

scenes.script: In the heart of Silicon Valley, a young coder named David stumbles upon something unusual...
scenes.image_prompt: A close-up shot of David's face, intense and curious, as he types away on his laptop in a cluttered, tech-filled room.

scenes.script: 'This can't be right. An app from 10 years ago with this kind of encryption?'
scenes.image_prompt: A wide shot of David's workspace, filled with old laptops and stacks of books, a vintage map of the world on the wall.

scenes.script: He decides to dig deeper. Little does he know, he's about to unearth a conspiracy that will change everything...
scenes.image_prompt: David hunched over his laptop, late at night, shadows dancing on the walls as he works.

scenes.script: *picks up phone* David? It's been ages. What do you need?
scenes.image_prompt: A woman in her 40s, professional yet casual, speaking on the phone, a city skyline behind her.

scenes.script: Lucy, I found something. An old app, encrypted messages... It's big, Lucy. Like global-conspiracy big.
scenes.image_prompt: David pacing back and forth on his balcony at night, city lights reflecting in the windows.

scenes.script: Meet me tomorrow. We'll figure this out together.
scenes.image_prompt: A neutral café interior, a few patrons chatting softly, Lucy sitting alone at a table with her laptop.

scenes.script: I think... I think they're onto us. Someone's been in my apartment.
scenes.image_prompt: David's apartment door ajar, light streaming in, boxes scattered on the floor as if searched.

scenes.script: We need to be careful. This could be dangerous, David.
scenes.image_prompt: Close-up of Lucy's face, concerned and serious, under soft café lighting.

scenes.script: As they delve deeper into the code, they begin to uncover a sinister truth...
scenes.image_prompt: A dark room filled with screens displaying lines of code scrolling rapidly.

scenes.script: This is... This is a list of targets. Thousands of them.
scenes.image_prompt: David and Lucy working side by side on their laptops, the glow of the screens lighting their faces.

scenes.script: We need to expose this. Now.
scenes.image_prompt: Lucy's hands typing quickly, determination in her eyes.

scenes.script: But exposing the truth won't be easy... And it might just get them killed.
scenes.image_prompt: A tense, dramatic shot of David and Lucy looking out a window at a dark, stormy night.

scenes.script: We can't stop now. We've come too far.
scenes.image_prompt: Close-up of David's face, resolved and focused, as he types the final lines of code.
